privacy.title: Privacy Policy
privacy.intro: We value your privacy and want you to know how we handle your personal data.
privacy.email: Email address: For account creation and communication
privacy.health: Health information: Information about pain and health status for personalized exercise plans
privacy.whyTitle: Why do we collect this data?
privacy.protectTitle: How do we protect your data?
privacy.protectText: We use modern security measures to protect your data.
privacy.contact: For privacy-related questions, contact us at privacy@example.com
privacy.endText: We may occasionally update this policy. We will inform you about significant changes.
